required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Randomized Double-Blind, Multi-Dose, Placebo Controlled Study of Acetaminophen Injection Post Surgical Dental Pain
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Multi-Dose, Single-Site, Placebo- and Active-Controlled, Efficacy, Tolerability, Safety and Pharmacokinetic Study of Two Different Dosing Regimens of Acetaminophen Injection in Post-Surgical Dental Pain.

brief_summary.textblock: To assess the safety, tolerability, analgesic, efficacy and pharmacokinetics of acetaminophen 1300mg (IV APAP) dosed every eight hours relative to placebo and acetaminophen 1000mg (IV APAP) dosed every 6 hours relative to placebo over a 24 hour period in patient experiencing moderate to server pain following the surgical removal of third molar.

detailed_description.textblock: This will be a randomized, double-blind, single-site, placebo-controlled, parallel-group study to assess similarities in safety, tolerability, efficacy, and pharmacokinetics of 1300 mg of injectable acetaminophen given in three doses, each 8 hours apart, relative to placebo, and 1000 mg of injectable acetaminophen given in four doses, each 6 hours apart, relative to placebo over a 24-hour period in patients experiencing moderate to severe postsurgical pain within 7 hours following surgical removal of 2 or more molars

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: IV APAP 1300 mg q8h versus Placebo IV APAP 1000 mg q6h versus Placebo

primary_outcome.measure: To assess efficacy of 1300 mg of intravenous acetaminophen and intravenous acetaminophen 1000mg to placebo in post surgical dental pain through 11 point Likert Scale
primary_outcome.description: Treatment comparisons that will be performed are: IV APAP 1300 mg q8h versus Placebo IV APAP 1000 mg q6h versus Placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics study of acetaminophen injection post surgical dental pain
secondary_outcome.description: The pharmacokinetics of of 1300 mg of intravenous acetaminophen and intravenous acetaminophen 1000mg to placebo. Measurements will include CMax

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics study of acetaminophen injection post surgical dental pain
secondary_outcome.description: The pharmacokinetics of of 1300 mg of intravenous acetaminophen and intravenous acetaminophen 1000mg to placebo. Measurements will include AUC

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics study of acetaminophen injection post surgical dental pain
secondary_outcome.description: The pharmacokinetics of of 1300 mg of intravenous acetaminophen and intravenous acetaminophen 1000mg to placebo. Measurements will include TMAX

other_outcome.measure: Safety study of acetaminophen injection post surgical dental pain
other_outcome.description: The incidence of the most common >5% adverse events will be compared between 1300 mg of intravenous acetaminophen and intravenous acetaminophen 1000mg to placebo

arm_group.description: IV Acetaminophen 1300 mg Post Op q8h
IV Acetaminophen 100 mg Post Op q6h
